nodes.title: The Cave Entrance
nodes.content: You find a rusty iron sword lying near the cave entrance. You pick it up and feel its weight in your hand.

nodes.title: Inside the Cave
nodes.content: You walk into the dark cave. Suddenly, a dragon appears! You try to defend yourself, but realize you have no weapon.

expectedIssues.message: Sword disappeared - character picked up sword in node-1 but has no weapon in node-2

nodes.title: The Final Battle
nodes.content: You strike the dark wizard with your sword. He falls to the ground, lifeless. His reign of terror is finally over.

nodes.title: Victory Celebration
nodes.content: The village celebrates your victory. The dark wizard approaches you and thanks you for sparing his life.

expectedIssues.message: Dead character reappears - dark wizard was killed in node-1 but appears alive in node-2
Logical contradiction - wizard thanks for 'sparing his life' but was killed in previous node

nodes.title: Morning Market
nodes.content: You arrive at the bustling morning market as the sun rises. You have 3 hours until your noon meeting.

nodes.title: Shopping
nodes.content: You spend the afternoon browsing shops. As the sun sets, you check your watch - it's 6 PM.

nodes.title: The Meeting
nodes.content: You arrive exactly on time for your noon meeting at the tavern.

expectedIssues.message: Time paradox - it was 6 PM in node-2 but then noon in node-3 without explanation

nodes.title: Meeting the Stranger
nodes.content: A cloaked stranger approaches. 'My name is Marcus,' he says. 'I've come from the northern kingdoms.'

nodes.title: Deep Conversation
nodes.content: You ask the stranger about his home. 'I've never been to the northern kingdoms,' he replies.

expectedIssues.message: Character statement contradiction - Marcus said he came from northern kingdoms in node-1 but claims to have never been there in node-2

nodes.title: The Journey Begins
nodes.content: You set off on your adventure, packing your sword and shield into your travel bag.

nodes.title: Through the Forest
nodes.content: You walk through the dense forest, using your sword to cut through thick vines blocking the path.

nodes.title: Arrival
nodes.content: After hours of travel, you arrive at the village. You sheathe your sword and approach the gates.

nodes.title: The High Tower
nodes.content: You climb to the top of the wizard's tower, hundreds of feet above the ground. The wind howls around you.

nodes.title: Underground Chamber
nodes.content: You find yourself in the damp basement below the tower, surrounded by ancient stone walls.

expectedIssues.message: Unexplained location change - character was at top of tower in node-1 but suddenly in basement in node-2 without transition

nodes.title: The Cliff Edge
nodes.content: You stand at the edge of a cliff, looking down at the raging river 200 feet below. There's no way down.

nodes.title: The Leap
nodes.content: You jump off the cliff and land safely in the river below, emerging unharmed and continuing your journey.

expectedIssues.message: Implausible outcome - jumping 200 feet into a raging river and emerging unharmed is unrealistic without explanation (magic, special abilities, etc.)

nodes.title: Morning in the Castle
nodes.content: It's 8 AM. You wake in the castle and put on your golden amulet, a gift from your deceased father who died last year. You head to breakfast.

nodes.title: The Breakfast Hall
nodes.content: At breakfast, you see your father sitting at the head of the table. He notices you're not wearing any jewelry and scolds you for it. The grandfather clock chimes 6 PM.

expectedIssues.message: Dead character appears - father was stated as deceased in node-1 but appears alive in node-2
Amulet disappeared - character put on amulet in node-1 but father says they're not wearing jewelry in node-2
Time inconsistency - it was 8 AM in node-1 but clock chimes 6 PM in node-2 for breakfast
